ocid: ocid prefix + unique id for the contracting process
date: date when this was first recorded or published

parties.id: assign id here unique within the release or turn name into id
parties.name: Basic Details > Organisation Chain

parties.id: assign id here unique within the release or turn name into id
parties.name: Tender Inviting Authority > Name

parties.id: assign id here unique within the release or turn name into id
parties.name: Awarded Bids List > Bidder Name

parties.id: assign id here unique within the release or turn name into id
parties.name: Bids List > Bidder Name

buyer.name: Basic Details > Organisation Chain
buyer.id: id assigned to buyer in the parties array

tender.title: Work Item Details > Title
tender.datePublished: Critical Dates > Published Date / Critical Dates > Publish Date

submissionTerms.allowPreferentialBidder: Work Item Details > Allow Preferential Bidder
submissionTerms.allowMultiCurrencyFee: Basic Details > Is Multi Currency Allowed For Fee
submissionTerms.allowMultiCurrencyBQQ: Basic Details > Is Multi Currency Allowed For BOQ

procuringEntity.name: Tender Inviting Authority > Name
procuringEntity.id: id assigned to procuring entity in the parties array

value.amount: Work Item Details > Tender Value in ¹

tender.mainProcurementCategory: Basic Details > Tender Category or Basic Details > Form of contract

tenderPeriod.startDate: Critical Dates > Published Date / Critical Dates > Publish Date
tenderPeriod.endDate: Critical Dates > Bid Submission End Date
tenderPeriod.durationInDays: Calculated field,  Critical Dates > Bid Submission End Date - Critical Dates > Published Date

enquiryPeriod.durationInDays: Calculated field, Critical Dates > Clarification End Date - Critical Dates > Clarification Start Date

contractPeriod.durationInDays: Work Item Details > Period Of Work(Days)

documentAvailabilityPeriod.startDate: Critical Dates > Document Download / Sale Start Date
documentAvailabilityPeriod.endDate: Critical Dates > Document Download / Sale End Date

value.amount: Tender Fee Details > Tender Fee in ¹

participationFees.description: Tender Fee Details > Fee Payable To

tender.numberOfTenderers: Calculated field from Bids List > Bid Number

tenderers.name: Bids List > Bidder Name
tenderers.id: id assigned to the tenderer in the parties array

documents.id: assign id here that should be unique within the array
documents.title: Tenders Documents > Nit Document > Document Name

documents.id: assign id here that should be unique within the array
documents.documentType: Tenders Documents > Work Item Documents > Document Type
documents.title: Tenders Documents > Work Item Documents > Document Name
documents.description: Tenders Documents > Work Item Documents > Description
documents.format: derive from Tenders Documents > Work Item Documents > Document Name
documents.url: derive from Tenders Documents > Work Item Documents > Document Name

milestones.title: use variable name from Critical Dates > Published Date, meaning Published Date
milestones.type: select one from milestoneType codelist based on the nature of a milestone

milestones.type: select one from milestoneType codelist based on the nature of a milestone

value.amount: Financial Evaluation Bid List > Value, join using Bid Number

tenderers.id: is assigned in the parties array

details.rank: Financial Evaluation Bid List > Rank, join using Bid Number

awards.id: assign id here unique within the release - this could be just 01

value.amount: Awarded Bids List > Awarded Value or AOC > Contract Value

suppliers.id: id assigned to this bidder in the parties array
